lead_paragraph: A C.D.C. inquiry found that a machine used in open-heart surgery at a hospital was probably tainted at the plant in Germany where it was made.

headline.print_headline: Tainted Heart-Surgery Machine Said to Infect 12 in Pennsylvania
headline.main: Bacteria on Device Said to Infect at Least 12 Patients in Pennsylvania

snippet: A C.D.C. inquiry found that a machine used in open-heart surgery at a hospital was probably tainted at the plant in Germany where it was made....
